channel.title: Help with my dragon claws any1?
channel.description: ok so when i spec with my d claws they spec like a dds, and the special attack doesn't even drain. any1 know how to fix?:S

item.title: Help with my dragon claws any1?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

[quote=“crom170, post:2, topic:264001”]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){ AttackingOn2.specGFX(341); specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee); lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(1658); actionInterval = getbattleTimer(); lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); specOn = false; }

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4151 && specialAmount > 49){
AttackingOn2.specGFX(341);
specialAmount -= 50;
hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit) + misc.random(StrPrayer) + misc.random(voidmelee);
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
setAnimation(1658);
actionInterval = getbattleTimer();
lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
specOn = false;
}

look at that[/quote]
He probably won’t have all those booleans, and ints.

Read full topic
